```{python}

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    # first object printed as head
    head = df.head()
    # second object printed as histogram with altair 
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x=alt.X('Random Numbers', bin=True),  
        y='count()'
    )
    # return as list
    return [head, histogram]

# 
result = preview_data(data)

# Display the first 
print(result[0])
# Display the histogram
result[1].display()

```
